author: third_watch
title: Family held captive by Taliban-linked group released
summary: An American woman, her Canadian husband and their three young children have been released after years of being held captive by a group with ties to the Taliban and called a terrorist organization by the ...

author: Yahoo News
title: Trump warns federal help can't stay in Puerto Rico forever
summary: President Trump warned on Thursday that he might pull federal relief workers from Puerto Rico even as the island struggles to recover from Hurricane Maria.

author: ipostwhaticareabout
title: Republican senator asks Trump if he's 'recanting oath' over war with press
summary: Donald Trump's ongoing war with the media over "fake news" escalated on Wednesday with the president calling for networks, and specifically NBC, to have their licenses revoked over reporting what he called "pure fiction." And one Republican senator inserted himself in the middle of the fight Wednesday evening. The White House and Defense Secretary Jim Mattis denied the report. Trump's threat to pull NBC's license drew Sen. Ben Sasse, R-Neb., into the fight.

author: ipostwhaticareabout
title: LeBron James, Colin Kaepernick have perfect reactions to Eminem's lethal Trump cypher
summary: Rapper Eminem aimed a devastating blow at President Trump during the BET Hip Hop Awards on Tuesday night.

author: third_watch
title: Trump Is Not A Good President, Must Be Impeached By Candidates Running For Office in 2018, Billionaire Donor Says
summary: A major Democrat donor has demanded the party to push for impeachment proceedings against President Donald Trump. Billionaire Tom Steyer sent a letter to Democrat lawmakers, asking them to seek impeachment of Trump and suggesting that the Republican is unfit for office.

author: ipostwhaticareabout
title: Donald Trump Extols A Tax Reform Plan With A Deficit Of Facts
summary: President Donald Trump hit the road again Wednesday to sell his tax proposal and, once again, relied on false statements to make the case.

author: rocky.j.mountain
title: Labor union challenges Jerry Jones' stand-for-anthem mandate
summary: A labor union is challenging Jerry Jones' decree that players must stand for the national anthem.

author: third_watch
title: Siding With NRA, Paul Ryan Calls For Regulation -- But Not Law -- On Bump Stocks
summary: WASHINGTON ― While a bipartisan effort is building in Congress to address bump stocks, House Speaker Paul Ryan (R-Wis.) says he wants a regulatory, but not a legislative, solution to the devices that allowed the Las Vegas mass killer to fire a semi-automatic assault rifle nearly as fast as a machine gun.

author: third_watch
title: Andy Cohen Replaces Kathy Griffin, Joins Anderson Cooper On CNN’s New Year’s Eve Special
summary: Andy Cohen will co-host CNN’s New Year’s Eve celebration with Anderson Cooper. Cohen, best known as host and EP of Bravo’s Watch What Happens Live, will join Cooper in Times Square in New York City. "New Year's Eve Live with Anderson Cooper and Andy Cohen" on Sunday, December 31st. "Andy is the life of the party wherever he goes, and what bigger party is there than New Year’s Eve? It is going to be a blast!" said Cooper in today’s announcement, while Cohen said, “I’ve…

author: third_watch
title: Kellyanne Conway Says She Never Uses The Term 'Fake News.' But She Has.
summary: WASHINGTON ― White House counselor Kellyanne Conway insisted Wednesday that while she doesn’t always like how the media covers her boss, she still has the utmost respect for the news business.
